description: An instance of a hotspot dom.
title: HotspotDomConfig

___index.description: The index of the hotspot, will be used to order hotspots in the z axis.
___index.title: Index

___color.description: The default background color of the hotspot, in any valide CSS value.
___color.title: Color

___class.description: The class or list of class to add to the hotspot, useful to set CSS to the hotspot by group.
___class.title: Class

___height.description: The height (in HTML referential) of the hotspot. It is used for placing the hotspot according to its center.
___height.title: Height

___width.description: The width (in HTML referential) of the hotspot. It is used for placing the hotspot according to its center.
___width.title: Width

___id.description: The HTML ID to append to this DOM hotspot. This ID is different than the UID one
___id.title: ID

$eref.description: An instance of a hotspot DOM offset.
$eref.title: HotspotDomOffsetConfig
